item.title: Florida man set to be 26th person executed in US this year, surpassing 2024's total
item.description: Florida plans to execute Michael Bernard Bell on Tuesday for a 1993 double murder outside a bar

item.title: Transgender asylum seeker released from ICE custody after order from federal judge
item.description: A transgender asylum seeker from Mexico has been released from a Washington state immigration detention center after being held for over a month

item.title: Murder trial begins for Colorado dentist accused of poisoning wife's protein shakes
item.description: A Colorado dentist accused of killing his wife of 23 years by poisoning her protein shakes begins trial with opening arguments this week
